n: Frozen Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Balls
des: "These delicious treats are a hit with kids and grownups alike. Who can resist fresh cookie dough---plus now no worries about raw egg!"
ins: Cream the butter and sugar in a mixing bowl. Stir in the vanilla, water, flour, chocolate chips, and walnuts, if desired, and mix until well blended. Roll dough into bite-sized balls (or use a small ice cream scoop). Place on a baking sheet and freeze until firm, about 2 hours. Store balls in resealable plastic bags in the freezer.
